# Government Tender Announcement: Human Resources Consultant - Food Services

## Tender Summary

The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) invites proposals from qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders to provide human resources consulting services for the Food Services Operations at CSC institutions.

## Tender Details

* **Title:** Human Resources Consultant - Food Services
* **Reference Number:** cb-404-87567090
* **Amendment Number:** 6
* **Solicitation Number:** 21120-23-4244880/B
* **Publication Date:** 2023-11-28
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-12-21T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-01-15
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-01-14

## Bidder Information

The tender is open to SA Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who are qualified under Tier 1 for the Human Resources Consultant category. The successful bidder will be awarded a contract for one (1) year.

## Description of Requirement

The CSC requires a Senior Human Resources Consultant to:

* Review and analyze the staffing model for Food Services Operations at CSC institutions
* Make recommendations to ensure appropriate staffing levels to support operational objectives

## Contact Information

For further information, please contact Darryl Singh at (343) 573-5918 or Darryl.Singh@csc-scc.gc.ca

## Tender Documents

The tender documents, including the solicitation notice, can be downloaded from the Canada Buys website at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26113/4244880-b_npp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26113/4244880-b_npp.pdf).
